article.title: Boeing to Deliver Next Generation Jammer for EA-18G
article.text: The Boeing Co., St. Louis, is being awarded $10,143,096 for delivery order 2049 against a previously issued basic ordering agreement (N00019-11-G-0001) for hardware integration for Phase II to integrate the Next Generation Jammer Pod onto the EA-18G aircraft. The Phase II hardware integration will ensure the development, preparation and delivery of the aircraft modification design is suitable for the technology development stage of the Next Generation Jammer Pod program. Work will be performed in St. Louis and is expected to be completed in February 2016. Fiscal 2015 research, development, testing and evaluation (Navy) funds in the amount of $6,100,000 will be obligated at time of award, none of which will expire at the end of the current fiscal year. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.?Â
